title: gantez
author: gantez
content: The year of 2022 will end today and we are looking into the next year 2023.As a member of this forum, old or newbie. I hope you have something that you do plan to achieve in 2022 as your resolution for the new year entering into the year 2021 to 2022. The reality is that you are checking if you get those plan of yours or not but what I have to let you know is if you achieve the things, you should thank God for it because it is not into your power that you have them it is the grace of God , so be thankful. If you didn't have that achievement you plan my advise to you is don't give up your hope for what plan you have because 2023 is another opportunity year for you to try on again. You review yourself to know the reason for not having that your achievement.Don't lose your hope to be greatDon't lose your hope to be great because hard times make for you to be tough.How many times that you have fall will not determine your future so keep trying.This is my new year message to everyone.

comments.author: pooya87
comments.created_time: December 31, 2022, 03:34:02 PMLast edit: December 31, 2022, 04:57:11 PM by pooya87
comments.body: It's good to look back from time to time to see how many of your goals you have been able to achieve. For me the one thing that bothers me is that I wanted to learn a new 3D and simulation software but I've only managed to get over the basics since I've been so busy this year.The good news for me is that there is still 79 days left until new year  Yeah we Persians celebrate new year on first day of spring (when it makes sense)  so I can still finish my learning journey and start next year to master this software.Happy New Year.

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: Quote from: pooya87 on December 31, 2022, 03:34:02 PMThe good news for me is that there is still 79 days left until new year  Yeah we Persians celebrate new year on first day of spring (when it makes sense)  so I can still finish my learning journey and start next year to master this software.This is good news because you know some part is finishing the year already and you are having more than 2 months to go on the plan you are having. This is close like a quarter of a year and a whole plenty of time to accomplish it. I wish you not be lazy about it and finish up your plan for yourself because you will get happy if you achieve it.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Happy New Year to everyone.I had a rough 2022 not only in my financial but some part of my life. But of course I am not lettiny this foming 2023 to be the same fate again. We all knew that there is always a hope and doing things as planned with some efforts will achieve those goals. Anyway I will just keep doing things positively to fulfill those dreams.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: gantez on December 31, 2022, 03:12:48 PMyou should thank God for it because it is not into your power that you have them it is the grace of God , so be thankful. I always do. But no offense to those folks that don't have the same belief, so respect to them for their achievements through their hard work and grit.Happy new year everybody!We're going to face another year of ups and downs from the market but, we're all sharing common goal and that's to see the market on high.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Whew, what a year  .  It's been a very difficult year for me and I am sure glad it is ending. At some point it felt my efforts were being poured into a basket. Well, I can say that I agree with the German philosopher Friedrich Nietzsche, when he said "What doesn't kill you, makes you stronger" I am sure ending this year tired, stronger, wiser and better. We go again in 2023.

comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: Having a goal for the next year is one of the most essential things to do at the beginning of the year or before the previous year's end.This practice is not peculiar to individuals alone even governments have fiscal budgets and national budgets against every year that way you plan your year and work in line to accomplish them, but most time things happen that we never prepared for and at that, while preparing for the new year we should also prepare against the unseen events that may come along the year and how we can survive them and coming out stronger.

comments.author: 8rch7
comments.body: Seems I don't have any special thing in this year in 2022 trough all my portfolio assets still going drop, but I am most happy because this years having healthy for me and my family exactly and most thank full for the God. I have good planning for next season actually want to be better with my condition from healthy and having financial freedom in 2023.Hope we are here always in our God protect and keep trying give the best for our family, many mistake made in 2022 and hope for next year in 2023 we can opening with good mindset and learned from about mistake made in 2022 become better for next year.

comments.author: Alisha-k
comments.body: Wow what a year it was. So much ups and downs in crypto investment but we still pulled through. I am not sure there was any loss of life this year despite how heart breaking crypto assets went including exchanges that crumbled peoples hard earned sweat. 2022 is a year full of so much lesson preparing us for something bigger in 2023 it will take only preparation to utilise all the opportunities 2023 will offer.

Its not been easy though through out last year,  atleast i can just encourage myself on the things i achieved but my greatest loss and dissapointment last year was loosing someone very close to me and this affected me but I thank God like you said OP because it was just by his grace that I was able to still be strong until this wonderful moments of the new year. Most of my plans were affected very badly by flood and it also took a soul from me.  The flood in my region had a big change in me.  i had to relocate to whole new ecosystem for a fresh start but notwithstanding we are still kicking and am hoping to achieve all my goals this year.
